statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE appliance_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-10-01 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE appliance_id = 1 AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM appliance_details WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' OR energy_rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE appliance_id = 123 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM appliance_info WHERE purchase_date < '2021-06-01' AND energy_rating = 'A';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionLogs WHERE log_id = 100 AND energy_consumed > 50;
DELETE FROM SmartAppliances WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung' AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
